name: Air Elemental Myrmidon (B)
resistance: lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
languages: Auran, one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical. Actions

traits.name: Multiattack
traits.desc: The myrmidon makes three flail attacks.

traits.name: Flail
traits.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 6)
traits.desc: The myrmidon makes one flail attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 18 (4d8) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.
